subject: Order cannot be tracked, and is very late
description_text:
Hi, I placed an order: # SSN5163 and purchased express shipping which
should have been 3-7 days. I have been unable to track this order, and it
has been two weeks since I placed it. I get this message from the tracking
site:

The following waybills have not been collected or have been shipped for
more than 3 months: SF6047195599460

I would like to know where my order is, thanks for any help you can provide.

conversations.body_text: Hi Chad Cartier,     We sincerely apologize for the shipping error earlier. Here is the latest tracking information for your reference.Â
